title: Memorandum of Understanding between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh for cooperation in the fields of Health and Medical Sciences
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. (Dr.) Rajitha Senaratne, the Minister of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine, to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding between the Ministry of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine of Sri Lanka and the Management and Training International Ltd., of Bangladesh for the promotion and cooperation between the two countries on matters pertaining to Health and Medical Science such as public health, nursing education, environmental and occupational health, the Health Policy and administration, community health, rural and urban health management, health tourism industry, adopting  Information and Communication Technology for health services, climate changes and disaster management and the promotion of Human Resource Management in the health sector, was approved by the Cabinet.
